name: Hentai Shooter 2: World Tour
description: Next chapter in a well-known shooter with hot alien beauties and exotic weapons. Our hero Seranul once again goes on a world tour to free the Earth from the invasion of evil men haters!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card Storage: 200 MB available space
